author: Microsoft
description:
Educators are embracing AI to strengthen Career & Technical Education (CTE). From faster lesson planning to more engaging classrooms and industry-ready skills. Teachers share how AI helps them save weeks of planning time, personalize content, and prepare students for real certifications and careers across engineering, agriculture, and more. The result: more freedom in the classroom, higher engagement, and graduates who are equipped to enter the workforce.

What’s inside
• What CTE is and why it matters
• How AI streamlines lesson planning 
• Building industry-level skills and certifications
• Boosting classroom freedom and engagement

Learn more: https://www.unlocked.microsoft.com/skilling-WA

Audio Description: https://youtu.be/FJ36lgA7GRc

title: Why teachers are embracing AI in the classroom
